Phoebe and Judy are sitting on the table looking at him. Ross and Chandler are sitting by the window talking. Rachel and Joey are in the kitchen fooling with Rachel's trifle. Monica walks into the living room from the kitchen.]

utterances.transcript: Dad, please don't pick your teeth out here! Alright, and if you're gonna put your feet up, why don't you sit on the-

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Monica gives Phoebe a surprised expression and goes over to Ross and Chandler.]

utterances.transcript: Well you're whippin' so slow! Can't you do it any faster?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Joey gives her an understanding look.]

utterances.transcript: Oh I am!

utterances.transcript: Okay, fine!

plots: Ross finally tells his parents that it was n't Chandler .
Rachel worries about making Thanksgiving trifle while Joey worries about getting dinner over with quickly so he can go to another party .
Monica is mad and Rachel is making her trifle .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Rachel's old room, Ross and Joey enter.]

utterances.transcript: Okay, look, I think we have to tell Rachel she messed up her dessert.

utterances.transcript: What?! What is with everybody? It's Thanksgiving, not...Truth-Day!

utterances.transcript: Look, when everyone eats that...that...Banana-Meat thing, they're all gonna' make fun of her, do you want that?
caption: look when everyone eats that banana meat thing they ll all make fun of her do you want that

utterances.transcript: Okay, okay, we'll just get everyone to act like they like it. That-that way noone makes fun of her and we still get to go to Sweet Potatoe Pie!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Okay, okay, we'll just get everyone to act like they like it. That-that way noone makes fun of her and we still get to go to Sweet Potatoe Pie! (Referring to the dancers.)
